title: Process & Sensors Mapping Project
subtitle: Interactive hierarchical visualization tool mapping production processes and PLC tags for global digitalization initiative.

sections.overview: I developed an **interactive hierarchical visualization tool** using **Python** and Plotly to map **production processes and PLC sensors**, transforming complex plant data into a standardized, **Aveva PI-ready** structure. This established a clear digitalization foundation, reducing technical complexity and enabling **global data alignment** for corporate integration.
businessValue: **Standardization**: clear and hierarchical organization of processes and PLC tags.
**Digitalization**: preparing information for integration into Aveva PI.
**Visibility**: improved understanding of the relationship between processes and sensors.
**Collaboration**: common ground between local and global teams for automation and Industry 4.0 projects.
keyResults: Development of an **interactive hierarchical graph** representing processes and parent-child relationships.
Integration of **PLC tags and statuses** associated with each process.
**Hover functionality** to display technical details (name, level, PLC tag, status).
Identification of processes **“To Be Implemented (TBI)”**, highlighted with distinct visual styling.
Exported visual representations for effective communication with stakeholders.
benefits: **Reduced complexity** in managing processes and sensors.
**Solid foundation** for signal capture and analysis in Aveva PI.
**Global alignment** in corporate data unification projects.
